about_the_game:
Dragon Expedition is a fantasy adventure action game that tells the story of the Eastern world being controlled by an unidentified robot prophet. The girl unexpectedly becomes involved in this conspiracy and becomes a dragon slayer warrior, heading alone to the Western demon world to search for the Dragon Crystal and save her home. From then on, embark on the long journey of slaying demons and exploring treasures. In the game, there are high degree of freedom tasks for you to explore, exciting real-time battles for you to challenge, and rich side storylines that will trigger countless exciting adventures. Your choices will overturn your destiny and rewrite different endings. Is it defeating the dragon to save our home? Or was it conquered by evil forces, and the dragon slaying warrior eventually became a dragon? Only by embarking on a long journey and writing fate with a sword can we ultimately control our destiny!

1. Control the flying dragon for high-altitude soaring and low altitude combat, and use various skills such as spewing flames and bombing shells to help you win with one strike.

2. Multi storyline and multiple endings, a high degree of freedom world for you to explore.

3. Skill points can be freely matched, and real-time combat combos can be used to win.

4. Bosses with different attributes are not only a test of strength, but also a competition of intelligence.

Dragon Expedition is a fantasy adventure action game that tells the story of the Eastern world being controlled by an unidentified robot prophet. The girl unexpectedly becomes involved in this conspiracy and becomes a dragon slayer warrior, heading alone to the Western demon world to search for the Dragon Crystal and save her home. From then on, embark on the long journey of slaying demons and exploring treasures. In the game, there are high degree of freedom tasks for you to explore, exciting real-time battles for you to challenge, and rich side storylines that will trigger countless exciting adventures. Your choices will overturn your destiny and rewrite different endings. Is it defeating the dragon to save our home? Or was it conquered by evil forces, and the dragon slaying warrior eventually became a dragon? Only by embarking on a long journey and writing fate with a sword can we ultimately control our destiny!

1. Control the flying dragon for high-altitude soaring and low altitude combat, and use various skills such as spewing flames and bombing shells to help you win with one strike.

2. Multi storyline and multiple endings, a high degree of freedom world for you to explore.

3. Skill points can be freely matched, and real-time combat combos can be used to win.

4. Bosses with different attributes are not only a test of strength, but also a competition of intelligence.
name: Dragon Expedition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 6GB or AMD RADEON RX580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I9-8700K or AMD RYZEN 9 5900X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 4060 8GB or AMD RADEON RX7600M XT‌
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: This is a fantasy adventure action game that blends Eastern and Western elements. Players will become dragon slaying warriors and embark on a long journey, freely wandering between multiple main storylines. Acquire various skills, and challenge the ultimate boss.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
